website_summaries.verdict: The Puro Sound Labs PuroQuiet ANC Bluetooth headphones bring adult quality and features to kid-sized volume-limiting headphones.
pros: The Puro Sound Labs PuroQuiet kids headphones have built-in volume limiting to help protect hearing, can be used wireless or wired, have active noise cancellation and a long battery life
cons: Active noise cancellation, Bluetooth and aluminum construction make them pricier than competing volume-limited headphones

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but very good
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my young toddlers as we’ll be on flights a number of times in the coming months. They fit well and are of great quality. The noise cancellation is pretty decent. However, it’s a bit too pricey as you can find Bose wired headsets that are actually cheaper. Drop it to 125, and it would be perfect. At the current price, I’d knock off 1.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. They fit my 4 year old daughter fine and are snug on me, but certainly not uncomfortable. The noise reduction works well and the BlueTooth is seamless. It is great to have the option to use a cable as well - my kids often share an audio book so having the cable option means they can both plug into the same device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: The headphone seems to be working fine and it does what it is supposed to do, i am not expecting big, crisp sound from a headphone for toddlers/children. The biggest problem is that for the price i would expect a better quality control. I have received a dented unit (see pictures) that wasn’t made during delivery. The headphone came in a case with padding and which was placed in the ussual Amazon delivery box.
customer_reviews.author: Shandre

customer_reviews.title: Everything works for smaller heads!
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty for my daughter! It fits her head (31/2 yrs old) and looks like it can grow to just short of my big head. The noise cancellation definitely works, maybe not on par with Bose or Sony but its noticeable and the sound is great. We bought this for the airplane and it looks like a winner!
customer_reviews.author: MobyS

customer_reviews.title: Great for flying
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my two year old to wear on a cross country flight. She had other kids headphones before but with the plane noise, you couldn’t hear any audio. These worked much better. I like that the volume is controlled for her little ears and that she could still enjoy her movie. I was hesitant because of the price but she will be able to wear these forever and it was worth it to have her happy for a portion of the flight!
customer_reviews.author: Amie  Peil

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These are annoyingly failing already. I've owned them less than a month and now the connection is already spotty at best. My daughter says they get very hot and are uncomfortable on her ears. I'm unable to return them, as that option seems to be gone so now I have some expensive trash.
customer_reviews.author: cindi griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great for small heads
customer_reviews.text: I'd tried on every headphone in Best Buy and all but the most expensive ones slipped down off my ears or were uncomfortable. I'm elderly and these fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for flying with toddler
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our first flight with our toddler and they worked perfectly. Noise cancellation works great, sound was good, no battery life issues and feels sturdy. Checked all the boxes for us.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: STOPS WORKING
customer_reviews.text: This product stops working after a short amount of time. I had them replaced by Amazon once, and just a few months later the replacement is also not working. No one will refund or make it right a second time. COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: F. B.

customer_reviews.title: Seem decent, but not comfortable enough for the kiddo.
customer_reviews.text: Overall these were decent. Good quality, good sound, and good noise cancellation. However, my kid didn't like wearing them as he found them uncomfortable to have sitting on his ear for more than 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Had these one week and when I turn on the noise cancelling the sound shuts off. For 80 bucks? No way! Have started the return process.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Uptain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes to have these in the movie theater for when it gets too loud for her and they work great! They connect to your phone easily and have been quite durable!
customer_reviews.author: Vader’s Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my 8 year old son who is very sensitive to noise. He has them in his classroom and at home. They work great and help him to stay focused
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service and products
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the Junior Jams! We have 2 pair and our 4 and 2 year old's love them! Fantastic sound and a wonderful product when it comes to quality! Very highly recommended! Great fit and are very durable! I would recommend these over any other brand on the market! Will be buying more in the future for family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs for my two sons. Both broke after the 30 day return window. One will not charge and the other will no longer connect to devices.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie D. Monaco

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging in 3 mos
customer_reviews.text: This pair was purchased in Mid December for Christmas and stopped taking a charge in mid-March. They are attractive and seemed to work well while they lasted but are now useless after 3 mos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our long plan ride with a 2 1/2 yr old. She loves wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Minister

customer_reviews.title: Great But Some Oddities
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are noise cancelling and bluetooth. The volume limiting is great for kids (and necessary!), and noise cancelling in the car is really nice. However there are some really weird cases you can get these headphones in where they don't want to response (depending on how you turn on/off ANC and bluetooth). ANC also needs to be turned off dependently of the headphones itself, which means our kids sometimes forget and run them out of battery.
customer_reviews.author: MrE

customer_reviews.title: 2 Year Old Boy Left Them On For A 3 Hour Flight
customer_reviews.text: The title sums it up. He touched them a few times but found them very comfortable. We were using them primarily for noise cancelling purposes
customer_reviews.author: Kailorbas

customer_reviews.title: Noise Cancelling feature is pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter to use in class to cancel surrounding noise during reading time. She has been way more focused and her teachers raved about how much they have helped. The headphones definitely cancel some noise but it’s not as good as my Bose headphones. Nevertheless, great price point and they worked well enough for my daughter to concentrate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Ear damaging high pitch noise in 'noise canceling' mode
customer_reviews.text: When we got our first pair, our son tried it on first thing and I was surprised to hear a high pitch noise when he pressed the headphones to his ears. I found that if you press the inside of the right headphone even slightly, this very loud high pitch sound appears, so loud it actually hurts in my ears! We thought, well this is a defective pair, so we returned and got a replacement. Same thing! Actually both headphones give ear damaging high pitch noise. See video. Kids safety headphones my ...!
customer_reviews.author: Ilja Kusters

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - best if not switching devices often
customer_reviews.text: Kiddo (age 5) loves these. Bold, bright color is perfect for kids. Sound is great. The wireless Bluetooth is less than ideal. As the kid switches often between mom and dad’s phones and tablet, it’s a bit annoying. We usually have to turn off the Bluetooth on the device and power down the headphones in order to switch the controlling device.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS PRODUCT!! Exceeds 120dB.
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is as expected for ~$100 headphones. Normal sound is limited, which is nice for little ears. However, the noise cancellation is faulty and can cause ear damage. When pressure is applied to the right earpieces, a high-pitched squeal (my Apple Watch placed next to the earpiece measured ~120dB) is emitted directly into the ear. The squeal only appears to happen when ANC is on. Regardless, this is not a safe product for children.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lenderman

customer_reviews.title: Protect my sons ears
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 8 year old son for the frequent flights we take. I wanted to protect his ears from engine noise. I really like that there is a bluetooth and also a wired option included with these headphones. We prefer him to use wired as much as possible and it's nice there is a choice. They fit well and the sound is good. He recently wore them on a 5+ hour flight and never took them off. He said they were comfortable. I'd recommend. Also, this is my 3rd set of headphones I've bought for him over the years and these seem like the most sturdy and they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids on flights
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves them. Worked great versus the whine of jet engines on multiple flights. I’m not sure what else to say. They work, they work well. Very glad I purchased them. Oh, and they appear to be the only kids’ headphones with active noise canceling on the market.
customer_reviews.author: James R

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. My parents bought them for my daughter for her birthday. And they are great. The quality is amazing. The charge holds for a long time. They’re comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: R. Winters

customer_reviews.title: Don't count on the manufacturers warranty
customer_reviews.text: I would give this zero stars if I could. Poor quality for the price. They broke after a month of use, and the company email no longer exists and no one returns calls to the customer service number. So the year warranty is a moot point if you cannot contact them. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie D. Monaco

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Solid and pleasant to use. Good quality sound. Works well with regular laptop and chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Greg P.

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones but they don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: The problems with this is that after a month or two of use they no longer work ! Ended up throwing them . They work very well at the beginning but then after a while they stop.
customer_reviews.author: Marg

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Used for 5year old on long haul flight so we didn’t blast his ears with ordinary headphones. Work amazingly well. READ THE INSTRUCTIONS: loudness limiting doesn’t work when plugged in with headphone jack. Only Bluetooth!
customer_reviews.author: Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Too small for an 8 year old.
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be high quality with good sound. I had to return them, though, because they were too tight and therefore uncomfortable for my 8 year old grandson. Wish that wasn't the case because they were very nice headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Christina D. Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Resistant
customer_reviews.text: We gave these to our very active toddler for trips and so she could have her own cool headphones instead of trying to wear all of her dad’s sennheisers. They survived flights and car trips with zero issues; being thrown and twisted and dropped many times.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Won’t charge
customer_reviews.text: Has only been a few months, and won’t take a charge any longer
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Power switch broken after three months
customer_reviews.text: We got these in August for zoom school, have treated them well and used normally. Now the power switch is broken and just flops back and forth. We can't turn them on and do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jasonaut

customer_reviews.title: Made a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift to my 11 year old grandson. He said they worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Milo T. Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: My kid hates stuff on his head. If he would keep them on he would love them.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Taco

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Good looking headset for kids. Volume cpntrol easy. Noise cancellation good enough although not to be compared to Bose technology. Charging cable did not fit properly into usb slot. Needed to use force to be able to connect. Not sure how long this will last...
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working one week after the 90 day window to return
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty expensive to last for three months, and I see another customer had the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our son (7 years old) for overseas flight. Fit great and work wonderfully!!!
customer_reviews.author: harmony england

customer_reviews.title: 1 of the best kid headphone
customer_reviews.text: 1 of the best kid headphone, real noise canceling, easy BT connnection and good sound quality. Best of all, great design! My 9 years old daughter love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love that these our wireless and light weight my 3yr old loves them and doesn't pull at them when he's wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Granger

customer_reviews.title: Good for noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.text: Work well for noise cancellation. We bought them for the classroom for my daughter. Good fit for small ears.
customer_reviews.author: David Verrecchia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. They look good and an adult can use them on maximum extension would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dermot O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he loves it. Took it with us on vacation and he wore the headphones during both flights and in the car.
customer_reviews.author: feis

customer_reviews.title: Good headset - but broke after 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: These are great headsets - unfortunately they only lasted about 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Orquina

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Don't let them fool you. This things broke faster than Trumps cronies.
customer_reviews.author: Brett D Weigel

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy but pricey....
customer_reviews.text: What’s to like about the Puro Sound Labs PuroQuiet On-Ear Earphones? Lots. Here’s a list of the pros and the one con that I can see. Pros: They remain within safe listening levels no matter the source of the sound. Both using Bluetooth and when corded, sound levels remain constant. This set has effective active noise cancelling and is great for travel. 18 hours of battery life. The wired version doesn’t easily tangle. They’re sturdy - the frame is aluminum - not plastic. It’s simple to connect to Bluetooth and there’s an on/off switch and volume control. Well-padded earpieces. Cons: Cost
customer_reviews.author: Lazy Day Gardener

customer_reviews.title: really great headphones for kids!
customer_reviews.text: We've had lots of headphones for kids that are cheap crappy headphones. These are quality headphones for kids. The sound and build quality is awesome. They're like Bose or Seinheiser for kids. I would totally use these if they were big enough for my head! They're perfect for our tween girls. We have a pair of the noise cancelling ones and the ones that aren't noise cancelling. They're both just as good. We did have problems with a pair that wouldn't charge, but Puro's customer service was awesome. My girls love these, and we totally suggest these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice Headphone for a Young Person.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for a twelve year old, who is a music fanatic, and an enthusiastic dancer. This set works really well for her. It's comfortable, the sound is good, and it works from her phone. She also travels extensively, long distance international trips, and this will come in very handy for her. It's pricey, but she's old enough to look after the headphones well.
customer_reviews.author: MHC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Headphones! Made For Smaller Heads..
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these PuroQuiet headphones for listening to music and also for using at school. They are very good at noise canceling and easy to sync. The buttons are easy to reach and control plus they’re very well padded and comfortable to wear for long periods of time. These can be used wired or blu tooth and hold a charge for over 16-22 HOURS. They say “for kids” and they’re a little smaller but still fit adult normal to smaller size heads...
customer_reviews.author: Sheepdogs&Poodles=SheepaDoodles

customer_reviews.title: Great!..
customer_reviews.text: ..these are wonderful. We got these for our grandsons after getting several, we never could pair with 2 headphones our Bluetooth TV but these do. We have an older Bose set and now these wonderful Puro brand so sometimes we don't have to hear their TV shows. For myself I do like the noise cancelling feature. I like to watch British programs on PBS or wherever and I understand them so much better with the noise cancelling. I'm a Senior Citizen so that may be why I like the noise cancelling lol
customer_reviews.author: B. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: ANC is helpful
customer_reviews.text: ANC is helpful, but not positive background noise bothers kids, at least my kids, that much. That said, with the volume limiting, it definitely helps. These are comfortable. The kid likes them. Being wireless is a godsend. Not having to worry about the wire snagging and pulling a phone or tablet to the ground. Not having to untangle them. Not having to plug them in. So great, especially when dealing with kids.
customer_reviews.author: anonymousY

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best quality wireless headphones I’ve ever seen Really great sound. Good sound limit And nice fit over ears. I love that there’s a lot of padding pretty much All over the headphones. My son doesn’t like them but I imagine that’s because He’s two and designed to be difficult. I tried them out for myself and really loved them! Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: ColeTan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Both my girls use these. I need to buy another set because they fight over who is going to use them. I recently started using these for home schooling. I find it to work excellent. My daughter can focus on what's in front of her instead of all the noises around her. It's worked much better than not using them.I put them on and it works really well!
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: very nice, very comfortable, and fits my daughters head fantastic. it looks so cute on her and the sound quality is just as good as my more expensive headphones. Bluetooth works flawlessly and comes with everything you need to use them including a very nice storage case with zipper closure. very happy with this product and would gladly buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lee

product_meta.title: Puro Sound Labs PuroQuiet Volume Limited On-Ear Active Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Headphones – Lightweight Headphones for Kids with Built-in Microphone – Safer Sound Studio-Grade Quality
feature_bullets: ACTIVE NOISE-CANCELLING HEADPHONES: The ANC switch puts the world on mute so that kids can listen clearly in loud environments.These headphones make daily noise and background sounds up to 22 dB quieter, complemented by 82% noise isolation (@ 1 KHz).

LIMITED VOLUME FOR KIDS’ HEARING SAFETY: A limited volume of 85 dB is the maximum safe sound listening level as recommended by many organizations. Intelligent digital signal processing imperceptibly limits the volume so that listeners don’t even notice.

WIRELESS HEADPHONES WITH BLUETOOTH FUNCTION: The one-touch Bluetooth pairing with iPhone, Android, and other compatible devices makes for hassle-free listening! The wireless mode eliminates all dangers of entanglement in audio cables.

LONG BATTERY LIFE: Enjoy up to 22 hours of non-ANC play time (16 hours with ANC) and 200 hours of standby. Quickly recharge the lithium-ion battery with included USB cable or switch to wired use with the included volume limiting audio cable.
30-DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE: The warranty period for our products is 1 full year. If you have an issue with one of our products, we maintain a 30-day money-back guarantee. It’s as simple as that!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars205 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
